mdRecord.dcterms:description: One graffiti telling reader to fight for love; series of responses after. Unattributed quote by Truman Capote above loving a wild thing, ... [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Love is the most important thing in the world Fight for it. but only fight for those who deserve it. | everyone deserves love | If you let yourself love a wild thing, you'll end up looking at the sky.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Love
Quotations
Capote, Truman, 1924-1984
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
